docs.text: Supercomputing & Accelerated Computing Welcome. This site is a growing knowledge base on: High Performance Computing (HPC) Supercomputing systems Accelerated computing and programming The goal is simple: to explain why things exist , not just how to use them . This site complements my LinkedIn writing and serves as a permanent home for long-form explanations.

docs.text: Accelerated Computing This is a first-principles deep-dive series on accelerated computing and programming . Topics include: - Why CPUs are not enough - Throughput vs latency - Data movement and memory walls - GPUs and other accelerators This series assumes curiosity, not prior GPU experience.
